page.title: 14A FARMER continued.
page.content: Mr.Hewitt does this until lunch time.He has an hours rest and has dinner.For dinner Mr.Hewitt has chicken,whole wheat bread and a mixed salad consisting of cucumbers,tomatoes carrots,peppers,spring onions and coleslaw. After dinner Mr.Hewitt goes straight back to work,usually planting vegetables and getting the ground ready for planting. Mr.Hewitt grows;Iceberg Lettuce,Calabrese,Leeks Sprouts,Potatoes: Estima,Pentland Squire,Romano(red potato). On the farm,there are 3 tractors. Mr.Hewitt hires 2 farmworkers to work from 8.00 a.m. till 5.30 p.m. but in the summer they work for 2 extra hours so they finish at 7.30 p.m. At 6.00p.m. Mr.Hewitt and his family,have tea.Sometimes he has a rest and has to go to a meeting of the Ches. Nat. F.U.
